content: The Devastation by Locusts
The word of the  that came to Joel, the son of Pethuel:
Hear this, you elders,
And listen, all inhabitants of the land.
Has  this happened in your days,

Tell your sons about it,
And  your sons  their sons,
And their sons the next generation.
Starvation and Drought
Consecrate a fast,
Proclaim a solemn assembly;
Gather the elders
all the inhabitants of the land
To the house of the  your God,
And cry out to the .
Woe for the day!
For the day of the  is near,
And it will come as destruction from the Almighty.
Has food not been cut off before our eyes,
Joy and rejoicing from the house of our God?
The seeds have dried up under their shovels;
The storehouses have become desolate,
The grain silos are ruined,
Because the grain has dried up.
How the animals have groaned!
The herds of cattle have wandered aimlessly
Because there is no pasture for them;
Even the flocks of sheep have suffered.
To You, , I cry out;
For fire has devoured the pastures of the wilderness,
And the flame has burned up all the trees of the field.
Even the animals of the field pant for You;
For the stream beds of water are dried up,
And fire has devoured the pastures of the wilderness.
